byline.contributor: Sangar Rahimi contributed reporting from Kabul.

snippet: Afghanistan’s president, Hamid Karzai, calls Pakistan a “twin brother” and India a “great friend.”
lead_paragraph: Afghanistan’s president, Hamid Karzai, calls Pakistan a “twin brother” and India a “great friend.”

headline.main: Karzai Tries to Soothe Pakistan Over Warmer Relations With India
headline.print_headline: Karzai Tries to Soothe Pakistan Over Warmer Relations With India
headline.seo: Karzai Tries to Soothe Pakistan Over Warmer Relations With India
